title: roast turkey drumstick
description: Turkey is not just for Christmas! The drumsticks cost very little and stretch a long way - perfect for a meaty pot-roast on a modest budget.This pot-roast can be cooked in advance and frozen, check the tips section for freezing instructions.
ingredients: 2 tbsp redcurrant jelly or cranberry sauce
300g/10½oz small new potatoes, scrubbed and halved
salt and freshly ground black pepper
